io.spine.server.command

Class AbstractCommandDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.command.AbstractCommandDispatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.spine.logging.Logging, MessageDispatcher<CommandClass,CommandEnvelope,java.lang.String>, UnicastDispatcher<CommandClass,CommandEnvelope,java.lang.String>, CommandDispatcher<java.lang.String>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractCommander, AbstractCommandHandler

    public abstract class AbstractCommandDispatcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements CommandDispatcher<java.lang.String>, io.spine.logging.Logging
    The abstract base for non-aggregate classes that dispatch commands to their methods and post resulting events to EventBus.

      Lazily initialized logger.

      • getId

        public java.lang.String getId()
        Obtains identity string of the dispatcher.

        Default implementation returns fully-qualified name of the class.

        Returns:
        the string with the handler identity

      • onError

        public void onError(CommandEnvelope envelope,
                    java.lang.RuntimeException exception)
        Handles an error occurred during dispatching a message.

        Logs the error into the log.

        Specified by:
        onError in interface MessageDispatcher<CommandClass,CommandEnvelope,java.lang.String>
        Parameters:
        envelope - the message which caused the error
        exception - the error

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        Indicates whether some other command handler is "equal to" this one.

        Two command handlers are equal if they handle the same set of commands.

        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        if the passed CommandHandler handles the same set of command classes.
        See Also:
        MessageDispatcher.messageClasses()
